text: The Secret Scripture is a 2016 Irish romantic drama movie directed by Jim Sheridan and was based on the 2008 novel of the same name by Sebastian Barry. It stars Vanessa Redgrave, Rooney Mara, Eric Bana, Theo James, Aidan Turner, Jack Reynor, Adrian Dunbar, Omar Sharif Jr.. ==Other websites== * Category:2016 romantic drama movies Category:Irish romance movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jim Sheridan Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Ireland
title: The Secret Scripture (movie)
